prompt: Generate examples of different media types: 1) Show me an image of a sunset, 2) Create a mermaid diagram showing a simple flow chart, 3) Generate a bar chart of sales data, and 4) Show some code examples
system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant that can generate multimodal content. Use markdown syntax for images ![alt](url), code blocks with ```language, and mermaid diagrams with ```mermaid
